title: Calling the restaurant to cancel a reservation

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Server: Good evening, thank you for calling the restaurant. How may I assist you today?
turns.user_response_option_en: Iris Kim: Hi, I actually wanted to cancel a reservation I previously made for this Friday. Is that possible?
